snippet.title: Chivalry 2 - Beta Announce | Release Date | Dev Diary | Epic Games Store Spring Showcase
snippet.description:
Chivalry 2 launches June 8, 2021. Pre-purchase on PC for guaranteed access to the Closed Beta, March 26-29! The Beta also features cross-platform play with consoles. http://www.chivalry2.com

Epic Games Store: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/chivalry-2/home
Discord: https://discord.gg/chivalry2
Twitter: http://twitter.com/chivalrygame
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Chivalry2/
Forums: https://forums.tornbanner.com/


#EpicGamesStoreSpringShowcase #EpicSpringShowcase #EGSSpringShowcase
